Articles.Content:
Ever since the start I've been trying to make a pod racer after each update, from low thrust designs that collide with each other without exploding to big 10 engine ones that can blow up the command module. Now I've finally gotten one out of the atmosphere and easily into orbit.

The main booster is 22 engines and alot of fuel, balanced in such a way that nothing over heats and explodes.... anymore. Some strut connectors prevent the pod racer from bending untill the boosters seperated.

Once the top engines have used up their fuel its just about cleared the atmosphere and is stable enough to attempt orbiting, the 2 yaw masters that make the pod racer so fun help alot.

Jebediah needs reactions of a jedi to fly this fast.

Only parts i used was Sunday Punch 1.09

If anyone else wants to make a pod racer feel free to post them in this thread. You dont need to get them into space and you get bonus points for not using a strut connector
nice.. never thought about doing something like that.. kudo's for giving me some idea's of what to do in KSP again because i was running out of them.
nice, too bad it will have little burn time... D:
it has about a minute of fuel as the pod racer, its a mid sized fuel tank fueling 3 medium engines... clearly I need to think bigger now and double its size
Real pod racing. >
